meta.description: Find the minimum total travel cost for a delivery van to visit each city exactly once and return to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: The cities that need to be visited.

params.name: travel_cost
params.description: The travel costs between each pair of cities.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the route goes from city i to city j.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total travel cost for the delivery van to visit each city exactly once and return to the starting city.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_E
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['E'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'E')
constraints.description: Ensure that city E is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_F
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['F'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'F')
constraints.description: Ensure that city F is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_G
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['G'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'G')
constraints.description: Ensure that city G is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_H
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['H'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'H')
constraints.description: Ensure that city H is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_I
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['I'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'I')
constraints.description: Ensure that city I is visited exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_E
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['E'] for i in CITIES if i != 'E')
constraints.description: Ensure that the route leaves city E exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_F
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['F'] for i in CITIES if i != 'F')
constraints.description: Ensure that the route leaves city F exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_G
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['G'] for i in CITIES if i != 'G')
constraints.description: Ensure that the route leaves city G exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_H
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['H'] for i in CITIES if i != 'H')
constraints.description: Ensure that the route leaves city H exactly once.

constraints.name: leave_each_city_once_I
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['I'] for i in CITIES if i != 'I')
constraints.description: Ensure that the route leaves city I exactly once.
